    @pytest.mark.validate_final_summary_cleaning_agent_residue_verification_details_custom
    def test_validate_final_summary_cleaning_agent_residue_verification_details_custom(self):

        no_of_runs_payload = number_of_runs_sample_limits()
    
        data.update({"no_of_runs_payload": no_of_runs_payload})

        final_summary = self.protocol_common_method.get_active_final_summary_details(data)["response"]
    
        equipments_id = self.protocol_common_method.get_protocol_equipments_ids(data)

            data.update({"equipment": i["equipment_id"], "external_id": i["external_id"],
                         "columns": ["sample type", "contact type", "sample id", "swab_limit_ppm", "rinse_limit_ppm"],
                         "sample_type": "Cleaning Agent"})
            sample_limits = json.loads(final_summary)["result"]
            data.update({"sample_profile": sample_limits})
            self.protocol_cleaning_agent.compare_samples_swab_rinse_surface_area_cleaning_agent_summary(data)
